title: Cannot send mlflow logs to the Windows sftp server

labels.name: area/tracking
labels.description: Tracking service, tracking client APIs, autologging

body:
### Issues Policy acknowledgement

- [X] I have read and agree to submit bug reports in accordance with the [issues policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)

### Willingness to contribute

No. I cannot contribute a bug fix at this time.

### MLflow version

- Client: 1.30.0
- Tracking server: 1.30.0


### System information

- **OS**: *Windows 10 (sftp Server) and windows 11 client
- **Python version**: 3.9.11
- **yarn version, if running the dev UI**:


### Describe the problem


Hi there,

I am having related issue regarding providing a correct address for the sftp server.
My sftp server is a windows machine. The sftp command from my local machine (also windows) to the server works:
Powershell:
$ sftp @server_ip:/folder_name
user@server_ip's password:
Connected to server_ip.
Changing to: /folder_name
sftp>

In my python code, I tried syntax provided by @gandroz in issue [2203](https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/issues/2203):

But the runs are still saved in the local ./mlruns
Any suggestions?

Thanks

### Tracking information

file:///C:/xx/xx/xx/mlruns
file:///C:/xx/xx/xx/mlruns
MLflow version: 1.30.0
Tracking URI: file:///C:/xx/xx/xx/mlruns
Artifact URI: file:///C:/xx/xx/xx/mlruns/0/d9396237332c43d7988fd89787eabcca/artifacts
AttributeError: module 'mlflow' has no attribute 'doctor'

### Code to reproduce issue

```
import os
import mlflow
from mlflow import log_metric, log_param, log_artifact, set_experiment, create_experiment, start_run
if __name__ == "__main__":
    ARTIFACT_URI = "sftp://<user>:<password>@server_ip:/home"
    EXPERIMENT_NAME = "test"
    create_experiment(EXPERIMENT_NAME, artifact_location=ARTIFACT_URI)
    set_experiment(EXPERIMENT_NAME)
    with start_run():
        # Log a parameter (key-value pair)
        log_param("param1", 5)
```

### Stack trace

NA

### Other info / logs

NA

- [ ] `area/uiux`: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server
